headline: Altria Group Q4 Earnings Call Highlights

headline: MO Q4 Deep Dive: Margin Compression and Smoke-Free Expansion Shape Outlook
summary: Tobacco company Altria (NYSE:MO) reported Q4 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 14.5% year on year to $5.85 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.30 per share was 1.3% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
